user.title: Connect to The Thinks Network v3 App
user.description:
Enter the API hostname, app id and API key for your TTN application.

You can find your API key in the [The Things Network console](https://console.thethingsnetwork.org) -> Applications -> application_id -> API keys

reauth_confirm.description:
The Thinks Network application `{app_id}` could not be connected.

You can find your API key in the [The Things Network console](https://console.thethingsnetwork.org) -> Applications -> {app_id} -> API keys

manual_migration.description:
Configuring {domain} using YAML was removed as part of migrating to [The Things Network v3](https://www.thethingsnetwork.org/forum/c/v2-to-v3-upgrade/102). [The Things Network v2 has shutted down](https://www.thethingsnetwork.org/forum/t/the-things-network-v2-is-permanently-shutting-down-completed/50710).

Please remove the {domain} entry from the configuration.yaml and add re-add the integration using the config_flow
manual_migration.title: The {domain} YAML configuration is not supported
